message.content:
cs.SE, cs.CY, cs.CR, cs.DL, cs.PL. 

The paper discusses software sustainability and productivity challenges in the context of the NSF and its SI2 program, which focuses on software infrastructure for sustained innovation. This suggests that the paper is likely to fall under the Software Engineering (cs.SE) category. Additionally, the challenges identified in the paper, such as funding models, career paths, incentives, training, interdisciplinary work, portability, and dissemination, are relevant to several other sub-categories, including Cybersecurity (cs.CY), Cryptography and Security (cs.CR), Digital Libraries (cs.DL), and Programming Languages (cs.PL).
